attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of ever increasing wholesale fuel prices, the detrimental effect of the dollar/ pound exchange rate and the increasing government revenue, the duty on fuel should now be reviewed

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Review fuel duty"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15745.asp

Prime Minister's Office
